about_the_game:
"Sakura, The Jirai-kei Magical Girl" is a novel game with choices.

Story

Soushi Akiba, an orphaned young man living a solitary life,

encounters a girl wearing 'Jirai-kei' -The goth-like fashion- in the bustling nightlife district.

In such a place with the day nearing its end, Soushi,

feeling sorry for the hungry girl, bought her some food.

But just as he tries to leave, a monstrous 'non-human' being, camouflaged as a human, attacks him.

With no hope in sight, a pink-haired girl in a sleek, cyberpunk-styled combat suit suddenly steps in.

"...Magical Gear Activation. Transform."

A transformation battle romance where love and duty collide to protect peace and everyday life!

Character

▶ Sakura

CV: Sayaka Fujisaki

"You don't need to take a bath every day."

A field operater for the Supernatural Disaster Countermeasures Team.

Sakura is shy, lazy, and completely helpless outside of battle, requiring constant support.

Her massive appetite racks up a food bill of 1 million yen every month.

▶ Tsubaki

CV: Mitaka Rin

"Think of the Countermeasures Team as a law enforcement agency specializing in 'UMAs'."

The head of the Supernatural Disaster Countermeasures Team.

She’s a calm and kind leader who seldom leaves headquarters.

▶ Soushi Akiba

Unexpectedly becomes Sakura’s caretaker.

A compassionate young man who always lends a hand to those in need.

Feature

  • E-mote-powered smooth animations

  • Branching routes with unique endings

  • Beautifully illustrated event CG

Staff

  • Character Design: Oyazuri

  • Scenario: Amamikabocha

  • Producer: Jiro Shinagawa

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a small number of CGs, including nudity and nudity of some characters.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit, Windows 11 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: A pointing device required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit, Windows 11 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: A pointing device required

short_description: Strong and charming as she is, the magical girl can't handle anything besides combat! A logical protagonist and a sheltered, needy magical girl find themselves in a caregiving transformation battle romance, protecting the world and everyday serenity together.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
